column5: Not saying I was always a saint - but was always taught to respect everything caught - keep or not.  This is just wrong!!!     If that was my kid .........!!!!   Not Funny!!
if it was a goby on the other hand..
lets hope someone who knows them and  calls the cops and have them charged

I tell ya what...if I ever see anyone doing that, I am going to take their paddle, and see how they like being hit with it......  Bunch of disrespectful punks.  People like that need to be taught a lesson.

I thought it would be much funnier if it was one of those punks getting hit in the head with the paddle,i would shove that paddle you know where??  ??? in sideways..IDIOTS...oh and ya that would hurt alot
looks like Rock Bass Baseball....but with a perch instead.  Gobie baseball........Now thats another story!
idiots..... I would tag it as offensive to notify youtube.
